parts.name: BMW 5-Series (E60/F10) Control Arm Upgrade
parts.description: The front tension struts (thrust arms) on the E60 and F10 5-Series are fluid-filled and prone to failure. Upgrading to the M5 version (E60 M5 or F10 M5) provides solid rubber bushings or monoballs for better steering feel and longevity.
specs: E60: M5 Tension Struts fit non-M (check bushing width)
F10: M5 arms are a direct bolt-on for 535i/550i

parts.name: Mercedes C63 AMG Control Arms on W204
parts.description: The front lower control arms from the C63 AMG fit standard W204 C-Class models. They have stiffer bushings and slightly different geometry for more negative camber.

parts.name: Mini Cooper R56 S Brake Swap to R53
parts.description: The front brakes from the 2nd Gen (R56) Mini Cooper S are a direct bolt-on upgrade for the 1st Gen (R53) Mini Cooper S. They are significantly larger (294mm vs 276mm).
specs: Requires R56 S Calipers, Carriers, Rotors, and Lines

parts.name: Land Rover LR3 / LR4 Control Arm Interchange
parts.description: Front lower control arms are interchangeable between LR3 and LR4. The LR4 arms have updated, larger bushings that last longer than the original LR3 design.
specs: Always replace hardware (eccentric bolts) when swapping

parts.name: BMW N54 Injector Index 12
parts.description: While not a cross-model swap, upgrading early N54 injectors (Index 1-10) to Index 12 is critical. These injectors are specific to the N54 but used across all N54 platforms (135i, 335i, 535i, Z4).
specs: Must code new injector values into DME
Do not mix Index 11/12 with older indexes in the same bank

parts.name: Mercedes M113K Supercharger Swap
parts.description: The supercharger assembly from an E55/SL55 AMG (M113K engine) can be retrofitted onto a standard M113 V8 (E500, S500, CLK500), though it requires significant fabrication, lower compression pistons, and ECU tuning.
specs: Donor: E55, SL55, CLS55, S55, G55 AMG
High difficulty: Requires custom pulley/belt routing and cooling

parts.name: Jaguar XFR / Supercharged Brake Upgrade
parts.description: The larger brakes from the Supercharged or XFR models (380mm front) can be fitted to standard XF or XJ models with the correct caliper carriers and 19"+ wheels.
specs: Calipers are often the same casting, just different carriers (brackets)

parts.name: Volvo P3 (S60/V60) 336mm Brake Upgrade
parts.description: Volvo P3 platform cars (S60, V60, S80, XC70) often come with 300mm or 316mm brakes. You can upgrade to the 336mm brakes found on the T6 / R-Design models simply by swapping the caliper bracket and rotors. The caliper itself is often identical.

parts.name: Audi S4 (B8) Brake Swap to A4
parts.description: The front brakes from a B8 S4 (345mm rotors, larger calipers) bolt directly onto a B8 A4. A very popular OEM+ upgrade.
specs: Requires S4 Calipers, Carriers, Rotors, Pads

parts.name: BMW F30 M-Sport / M-Performance Brakes
parts.description: The 4-piston Brembo front calipers (Blue, Red, Orange, or Yellow) found on F30 335i/340i M-Sport models or sold as the M-Performance kit fit all F30 3-Series models. Requires 18" wheels.
specs: Coding required for DSC to account for larger brakes
